THE END OF THE FRACKING WORLD

THE AWARD-WINNING ACTION BLOCKBUSTER RETURNS...MORE EXPLOSIVE THAN EVER

Before nDreams’ critically acclaimed Synapse and the frenetic chaos of Frenzies there was Fracked. The original trailblazing VR action adventure that seamlessly collides relentless “run and cover” gunfights with free and fluid skiing and climbing. Uncompromising, audacious, and unashamedly stylish, Fracked grabs VR by the Touch Controllers to deliver a truly ass-kicking virtual reality experience!
Stranded in a remote mountain facility, you play the reluctant hero forced into a final stand between the planet and a legion of interdimensional enemies. Take aim and run head-first into explosive action as you shoot, ski, and climb your way across an extreme adventure. Alone, on the edge and really fracked off, humanity’s survival is in your hands.

BE THE ACTION HERO

Move freely around the battlefield to outflank, outsmart and outgun an escalating threat with your arsenal of deadly, fully interactive weapons.

FEEL THE ADVENTURE

Lean into bends on skis, reach out and hold on as you climb and zipline far above the ground or perform audacious base-jumps to elude your foes.

SAVE THE PLANET

Take on an interdimensional army that combines hive mind mentality and gun-wielding supremacy. Save the day, save the world.
